quote: All hail the God Emperor
The spice must… take its time
Fear is the little delay
Plans within plans within progress bars
Summoning a slight prescience
The Shrike is watching
A pilgrimage always takes longer than planned
The Time Tombs aren't opening just yet
Psychohistory predicted this pause
Violence is the last refuge of the impatient
The equations say we’ll get there eventually
There’s always another secret
Burning metals for a little more patience
The mists are gathering slowly
Life before loading, loading before destination
The spren are being uncooperative again
Journey before… everything, really

book: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy
quote: Don’t panic

book: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy
quote: Time is an illusion; loading time doubly so

book: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy
quote: Mostly harmless. Mostly waiting.
Big Brother is watching the progress bar
Ignorance is strength. Patience is mandatory.
So we beat on, boats against the current… slowly
Can’t repeat the past? ...We’re trying.
Curiouser and curiouser
Down the rabbit hole we go, just a bit slower
One does not simply rush a spinner
Even the smallest delay can change the course of the future
Not all those who wander are finished loading
Mischief… managed eventually
The wand chooses the wizard, but the spinner chooses violence
The rest is… buffering
To load, or not to load—that is the question
By the pricking of my thumbs, something laggy this way comes
Out, out brief stutter!
Beware the Ides of Delay
Once a king or queen of Narnia, always waiting on a wardrobe
Further up and further… hold on
Completing is never as simple as it sounds
So it delays
Call me… patient
The portrait is aging faster than this spinner
